# Jerry Can Spirits

> Veteran-Owned Premium British Rum - Engineered for reliability, designed for adventure

## Company Overview

Jerry Can Spirits is a veteran-owned premium spirits company based in Blackpool, Lancashire, UK. Founded by Royal Corps of Signals veterans, we craft small-batch British rum with authentic military heritage and expedition-ready quality.

## Who We Serve

- Adventure seekers and outdoor enthusiasts
- Cocktail enthusiasts and home bartenders
- The military community and veterans
- People who value authentic heritage and craftsmanship
- Those seeking premium spirits with a story

## What We Do

### Premium Spirits
We produce small-batch British rum engineered for reliability and designed for adventure. Our spirits embody military precision, outdoor resilience, and expedition readiness.

### Field Manual (Free Educational Content)
A comprehensive cocktail education platform featuring:
- Classic and modern cocktail recipes
- Ingredient guides (spirits, liqueurs, bitters, mixers, fresh ingredients, garnishes)
- Barware and equipment guides
- Expert tips and techniques

### Guides (In-Depth Educational Articles)
Long-form educational content organised into pillar guides and supporting articles:
- Cocktail Techniques (shaking, stirring, balance, methods)
- Spirits Education (terminology, glossaries, beginner resources)
- Rum Guides (types, regions, tasting, history)
- UK Craft Spirits (distilleries, producers, trends)
- Buying Guides (equipment recommendations, brand comparisons)

### Military Heritage
- Founded by British Armed Forces veterans
- Royal Corps of Signals heritage
- Armed Forces Covenant signatory
- Authentic military design language (jerry can iconography, tactical aesthetics)

## Brand Values

- **Reliability**: Military-grade quality and consistency
- **Adventure**: Spirits designed for expedition and exploration
- **Heritage**: Authentic Royal Corps of Signals veteran foundation
- **Education**: Free, expert cocktail knowledge for everyone

## Product Philosophy

We don't just make rum - we engineer spirits with the same precision and reliability expected of military equipment. Every bottle is expedition-ready, whether you're mixing cocktails in the field or behind the bar.
